content: I'm actually planning a trip similar to my previous camping trip to Big Sur, where we stayed at Pfeiffer Big Sur State Park and spent two nights under the stars. We hiked to McWay Falls on the first day, and on the second day, we did a shorter hike to Pfeiffer Beach. Do you have any recommendations for camping gear, such as a portable stove or camping lantern, that would make our trip more comfortable?
